items.title: Australian Christian leaders share Christmas message of ‘light’ and ‘hope’
items.summary: Christian leaders from across Australia have delivered their Christmas messages, saying light will overcome darkness in the wake of the Bondi terror attack.

items.title: US officials uncover another million documents potentially linked to Epstein
items.summary: It comes a week after hundreds of thousands of Epstein files were made public, many of which were redacted, angering both Republicans and Democrats.

items.title: 'Impossibly high threshold': Northern Territory bail laws facing High Court challenge
items.summary: An Aboriginal legal service in the NT will launch a challenge to laws it says undermine fundamental legal principles.

items.title: Your guide to holiday trading hours across Australia
items.summary: What's open this holiday season? Supermarket, retail, liquor, bank and medical trading hours across Australia.

items.title: Minns defends 'extraordinary measures' after protest and gun laws pass
items.summary: NSW has passed sweeping legislation tightening gun laws and granting police expanded powers to restrict public protests following the Bondi attack.

items.title: Israeli president's planned post-Bondi-attack visit to Australia draws mixed reaction
items.summary: While mainstream Jewish organisations have welcomed Isaac Herzog's recently announced visit to Australia, others have expressed dismay.

items.title: Not all sunglasses protect you from eye damage. Here's how to spot the difference
items.summary: Some sunglasses can put you at risk of eye damage. Here's how to tell the difference.

items.title: How one phone call cost Vicky $47,000
items.summary: With Australia introducing world-first scam prevention legislation earlier this year, we hear from people who are seeking justice.

items.title: Christmas Day weather extremes across Australia
items.summary: Severe storms threaten Queensland, Melbourne will be cool and WA braces for extreme heat and bushfire warnings on Christmas Day.

items.title: Bondi heroes to be recognised in special honours list, Albanese announces
items.summary: The prime minister says the awards will be announced next year.

items.title: UK national facing deportation for alleged display of Nazi symbols, Burke confirms
items.summary: The news comes after a South African man had his visa cancelled in November for taking part in a neo-Nazi rally.

items.title: Capped numbers, shorter licences: How gun laws are set to change in NSW
items.summary: NSW parliament has passed new firearms legislation in the wake of the Bondi Beach terror attack.

items.title: New Epstein records allege Trump flew on his jet 'many more times' than reported
items.summary: A new batch of documents related to Jeffrey Epstein has been released by the US justice department.

items.title: This country has been crowned the world's 'happiest' for decades. Experts reveal why
items.summary: Some experts suggest Denmark's happiness success is due to a focus on learning compassion, empathy and human connection at an early age.

items.title: 'Deeply loved': Former federal MP Katie Allen honoured after dying at age 59
items.summary: The former Liberal MP revealed in May that she had been diagnosed with a rare and aggressive form of cancer known as cholangiocarcinoma.

items.title: Double demerits: What are the holiday road rules in place in your state?
items.summary: In some parts of Australia, double demerits have arrived.

items.title: Albanese government names groups it wants to crack down on amid anti-hate speech push
items.summary: The Albanese government has revealed two groups in its sights for allegedly promoting hate and disunity.

items.title: The simple Christmas food swaps that'll cut your grocery bill
items.summary: Some Australians are looking for ways to lower their grocery bills, as the cost of living continues to bite. Here are the top tips from experts.

items.title: Minns says protesters 'almost troll-like', unleashing 'forces they can't control'
items.summary: NSW Premier Chris Minns appeared to link the behaviour of some protesters to 'extreme actions' in the community.

items.title: Albanese recommends changes to MP travel perks following expenses controversy
items.summary: Families of politicians would have their flights downgraded to economy class if the recommendations are implemented.

items.title: 'A part of the US': Trump appoints Greenland envoy, sparking diplomatic backlash
items.summary: The US move revives sovereignty fears in the Arctic, as Denmark and Greenland warn strategic interests cannot justify territorial claims.

items.title: Ley stands by Wong criticism; Bowen calls Coalition words 'disgusting' amid Bondi debate
items.summary: As Sussan Ley stands by her attack on Penny Wong over the Bondi tragedy, Chris Bowen has condemned Ley's remarks as politically charged.

items.title: 'Retreating' or playing the long game: Have the Greens faded from the spotlight?
items.summary: In a sit-down with SBS News, Larissa Waters has admitted that while different from Adam Bandt, she's still fighting for the same values.

items.title: Russian general killed by car bomb in Moscow as Ukraine peace talks stall
items.summary: A string of Russian military figures and high-profile supporters of Moscow's war in Ukraine have been assassinated during the nearly four-year-old conflict.
